reviewText: I've got the complete set, the movie and the magazine. It took me a while to get my hands on this material after I first saw the exhibit in the SMAK museum in Belgium. Really good work, interesting to view it again from a post 9-11 perspective.  In 2000, before the DVD was out, I wanted to buy the material, so I actually contacted the artist, and he quoted an insane price above $100,000 USD.  Good thing I waited for the DVD to come out!
